about.title: About Us
about.description: Sunlight Supply Company is a leading provider of high-quality recycled plastic materials, serving industries around the globe. We are committed to sustainability, driving innovation, and reducing environmental impact through our dedicated efforts in plastic recycling.
about.welcome: We welcome you to get to know our passionate team and learn more about our ongoing journey towards a more sustainable future. Our commitment is rooted in transparency, excellence, and making a positive contribution to both our clients and the environment.
